thread.title: Airbus finance chief is latest to join departures lounge

title: Airbus finance chief is latest to join departures lounge
text:
Airbus finance chief is latest to join departures lounge 9:52am EDT - 01:03
Airbus finance chief Harald Wilhelm will leave in 2019, the European planemaker announced on Monday, removing a leading contender to replace CEO Tom Enders when he departs next year. Ciara Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Airbus finance chief Harald Wilhelm will leave in 2019, the European planemaker announced on Monday, removing a leading contender to replace CEO Tom Enders when he departs next year. Ciara Lee reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2rIdDb1
